title: Fable: The Journey
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Swedish, Japanese, Korean, Chinese.  This game requires a Kinect™ Sensor.  Built from the ground up for Kinect for Xbox 360, Fable: The Journey is a whole new way to experience the deep storyline, heart-pounding action, and picturesque world of Albion that fans have come to know and love in the beloved Fable franchise.  Wield magic as a deadly weapon as you defend yourself and your trusty steed in combat against dangerous enemies, engage in hair-raising chases, solve perplexing puzzles, and interact with humorous characters in this action-packed adventure journey to becoming a hero. Voice command support only available in English language and US, Canada, UK, Ireland, Australia and New Zealand locales.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".

childDownloads.title: Chicken T-shirt
childDownloads.description: The muse for generations of artists, writers, and milliners, chickens have been observers and participants at every key moment in Albion’s history since the fall of the Old Kingdom. Their reward for these years of dutiful service is to be kicked from street to street for the amusement of passers-by, a fate they endure with a surprising dignity of spirit. Show your support for these noble fowl with this snazzy Chicken T-shirt!

childDownloads.title: Chicken T-shirt
childDownloads.description: The muse for generations of artists, writers, and milliners, chickens have been observers and participants at every key moment in Albion’s history since the fall of the Old Kingdom. Show your support for these noble fowl with this snazzy Chicken T-shirt!

childDownloads.title: Dangly Gnome
childDownloads.description: Albion was once awash with aggressive porcelain gnomes that came to life. This plague was finally eradicated by the Hero of Brightwall, and Albion's gnomes have once again been restored to silence. Or have they? If you get lonely during your travels, hang this fellow in your cart and find out!

childDownloads.title: Fable: The Journey Albion Way Theme
childDownloads.description: Albion's roads have much to tempt an adventurer: magical treasures, hidden loot, the occasional alluring hobbe in a wig. Bring them all to your Dashboard with this Fable: The Journey theme. Note: hobbes left unsupervised at owner's risk.

childDownloads.title: Fable: The Journey Beware the Magic Theme
childDownloads.description: The power of magic lies within us all -- harness your Heroic abilities with this Fable: the Journey theme! But beware, for the life of a Hero isn't all waving to crowds and kissing babies. There's also a high chance of minor cuts, bruises, and/or having your soul consumed by a creature from the Void.

childDownloads.title: Fable: The Journey Demo
childDownloads.description: Built from the ground up for Kinect for Xbox 360, Fable: The Journey is a whole new way to experience the deep storyline, heart-pounding action, and picturesque world of Albion that fans have come to know and love in the beloved Fable franchise.  Wield magic as a deadly weapon as you defend yourself and your trusty steed in combat against dangerous enemies, engage in hair-raising chases, solve perplexing puzzles, and interact with humorous characters in this action-packed adventure journey to becoming a hero.

childDownloads.title: Fable: The Journey Fireball Spell
childDownloads.description: Have you ever woken up one morning and thought to yourself, "I wish I could fling fireballs from my fingertips"? Well, now you can! You should also congratulate yourself on some nifty alliteration.

childDownloads.title: Fable: The Journey Gabriel Boots
childDownloads.description: Gabriel wears the ancestral garb of Albion's northern Dwellers. Now you can too!

childDownloads.title: Fable: The Journey Gabriel Boots
childDownloads.description: Gabriel wears the ancestral garb of Albion's northern Dwellers. Now you can too!

childDownloads.description: Gabriel wears the ancestral garb of Albion's northern Dwellers. Now you can too!

childDownloads.title: Fable: The Journey Gabriel Gloves
childDownloads.description: Gabriel wears the ancestral garb of Albion's northern Dwellers. Now you can too!

childDownloads.title: Fable: The Journey Gabriel Pants
childDownloads.description: Gabriel wears the ancestral garb of Albion's northern Dwellers. Now you can too! These pants are cut from traditional Dweller cloth, though it lacks the traditional Dweller horse dung stains.

childDownloads.description: Gabriel wears the ancestral garb of Albion's northern Dwellers. Now you can too! These pants are cut from traditional Dweller cloth, though it lacks the traditional Dweller horse dung stains.

childDownloads.description: Gabriel wears the ancestral garb of Albion's northern Dwellers. Now you can too! This top is cut from traditional Dweller cloth, though it lacks the traditional Dweller horse dung stains.

childDownloads.description: Gabriel wears the ancestral garb of Albion's northern Dwellers. Now you can too! This top is cut from traditional Dweller cloth, though it lacks the traditional Dweller horse dung stains.

childDownloads.title: Fable: The Journey Heroes Picture Pack
childDownloads.description: A pack containing five of the heroes of Fable: The Journey! Get ready for the road with Hero-to-be Gabriel; his loyal horse, Seren; the mysterious Seer Theresa; Dweller leader Katlan; and courageous woodsman Fergus.

childDownloads.title: Fable: The Journey Hollow Man Outfit
childDownloads.description: Wisps are cursed souls, doomed to remain in our world long after their bodies have rotted. All across Albion, they have to seek out corpses to once more walk the earth as Hollow Men. Save yourself the trouble of digging up a body with this Hollow Man outfit. Note: rotting flesh not included.

childDownloads.title: Fable: The Journey Hollow Man Outfit
childDownloads.description: Wisps are cursed souls, doomed to remain in our world long after their bodies have rotted. All across Albion, they have to seek out corpses to once more walk the earth as Hollow Men. Save yourself the trouble of digging up a body with this Hollow Man outfit. Note: rotting flesh not included.

childDownloads.title: Fable: The Journey Misfits Picture Pack
childDownloads.description: A pack containing some of the misunderstood souls one encounters while on the road in Albion: the avaricious Tollkeeper; the confused clairvoyant Benny;  damsel-in-distress Betty; the ever-present chicken; and the…er… vicious, world-consuming Lieutenant of the Void, the Devourer.

childDownloads.title: Fable: The Journey Monsters Picture Pack
childDownloads.description: A pack containing five of the beasts that plague Albion's travellers: hollow men, rockmites, balverines, hobbes, and trolls!

childDownloads.title: Fable: The Journey Open Road Theme
childDownloads.description: The start of a Journey offers infinite possibilities. Bring that sense of excitement and wonder to your Dashboard with this Fable: The Journey theme.

childDownloads.title: Fable: The Journey Pet Hobbe
childDownloads.description: Hobbes are mischievous and highly destructive beasts that plague Albion. As such, what could be a better thing to keep stowed in your pockets?

childDownloads.title: Fable: The Journey Seren
childDownloads.description: Seren is unwavering in her loyalty to her master, an ever-present and faithful companion. Reward her with a little love and attention (apples are an acceptable substitute).

childDownloads.title: Fable: The Journey Story Documentary
childDownloads.description: Take in the beautiful scenery of Albion as the Journey team explain how Theresa and the Spire are back in the story of Fable: The Journey.

childDownloads.title: Fable: The Journey Theresa Outfit
childDownloads.description: Theresa, Seer of the Spire, has wandered Albion for centuries. Her age is remarkable, but the real miracle is that her clothes have lasted just as long, remaining impervious to damage, dirt and the vagaries of fashion.

childDownloads.title: Fragment of the Spire
childDownloads.description: The Spire looms over Albion, a focus for all the magic in the world. Adventurers have often made the dangerous voyage across the sea to capture fragments of the Spire for themselves, as such shards are rumoured to possess great power. This artefact will increase the magical charge of your gauntlets, allowing you to cast more Bolt spells in combat.

childDownloads.title: Gauntlets of Bolt
childDownloads.description: The Gauntlets of Bolt grant one free upgrade to your Bolt spell.

childDownloads.title: Gauntlets of Flame
childDownloads.description: The Gauntlets of Flame grant one free upgrade to your Fireball spell.
